Meteor.GameEngine.Interfaces

Interface Cortex

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bounds, Meteor, State, StateManager

    public interface Cortex
    Cortex is the main game engine's interface class.
    This class is used to force other classes extending Meteor to implement its methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init()
      A method that takes field variable(s) and instantiates them.
      void render(Manager manager, Context ctx)
      The required render() method for the Meteor object.
      void update(Manager manager, double delta)
      The required update() method for the Meteor object.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        A method that takes field variable(s) and instantiates them.

      • update

        void update(Manager manager,
            double delta)
        The required update() method for the Meteor object. Updates the game based on the back-end game clock.
        Parameters:
        manager - The engine manager object.
        delta - Time elapsed between each frame.

      • render

        void render(Manager manager,
            Context ctx)
        The required render() method for the Meteor object. Renders all of the game objects based on the back-end game clock.
        Parameters:
        manager - The engine manager object.
        ctx - The Game render 'canvas'.
